0.description: Sets time length per step. Minimum 3usec.

1.description: Sets a short hold delay when stopping to let dynamics settle before disabling steppers. Value 255 keeps motors enabled with no delay.

2.description: Inverts the step signal. Set axis bit to invert (00000ZYX).

3.description: Inverts the direction signal. Set axis bit to invert (00000ZYX).

4.description: Inverts the stepper driver enable pin signal.

5.description: Inverts the all of the limit input pins.

6.description: Inverts the probe input pin signal.

10.description: Alters data included in status reports.

11.description: Sets how fast Grbl travels through consecutive motions. Lower value slows it down.

12.description: Sets the G2 and G3 arc tracing accuracy based on radial error. Beware: A very small value may effect performance.

13.description: Enables inch units when returning any position and rate value that is not a settings value.

20.description: Enables soft limits checks within machine travel and sets alarm when exceeded. Requires homing.

21.description: Enables hard limits. Immediately halts motion and throws an alarm when switch is triggered.

22.description: Enables homing cycle. Requires limit switches on all axes.

23.description: Homing searches for a switch in the positive direction. Set axis bit (00000ZYX) to search in negative direction.

24.description: Feed rate to slowly engage limit switch to determine its location accurately.

25.description: Seek rate to quickly find the limit switch before the slower locating phase.

26.description: Sets a short delay between phases of homing cycle to let a switch debounce.

27.description: Retract distance after triggering switch to disengage it. Homing will fail if switch isn't cleared.

30.description: Maximum spindle speed. Sets PWM to 100% duty cycle.

31.description: Minimum spindle speed. Sets PWM to 0.4% or lowest duty cycle.

32.description: Enables laser mode. Consecutive G1/2/3 commands will not halt when spindle speed is changed.

100.description: X-axis travel resolution in steps per millimeter.

101.description: Y-axis travel resolution in steps per millimeter.

102.description: Z-axis travel resolution in steps per millimeter.

110.description: X-axis maximum rate. Used as G0 rapid rate.

111.description: Y-axis maximum rate. Used as G0 rapid rate.

112.description: Z-axis maximum rate. Used as G0 rapid rate.

120.description: X-axis acceleration. Used for motion planning to not exceed motor torque and lose steps.

121.description: Y-axis acceleration. Used for motion planning to not exceed motor torque and lose steps.

122.description: Z-axis acceleration. Used for motion planning to not exceed motor torque and lose steps.

130.description: Maximum X-axis travel distance from homing switch. Determines valid machine space for soft-limits and homing search distances.

131.description: Maximum Y-axis travel distance from homing switch. Determines valid machine space for soft-limits and homing search distances.

132.description: Maximum Z-axis travel distance from homing switch. Determines valid machine space for soft-limits and homing search distances.
